QuestData.Title: A Fate Worse Than Dying
QuestData.Description: When the Burning Legion takes a prisoner, it is not an act of mercy.$b$bWhile death is the destruction of the mortal body... if you are captured by the Legion, they will seek to destroy your soul.$b$bThe Burning Legion uses sacrificial souls to power their demonic machinations of war. The soul engine is where the harvested souls are collected and stored.$b$bThough countless have already perished in the soul engine, you may yet save those still alive inside.$b$bHurry and release them before it is too late!
QuestData.CompletionText: Have the soul engine cages been opened?
QuestData.RewardText: The destruction of the soul is a fate far worse than death. You have done a great service to those you saved.
